article:
I have a friend.His name is Lin Tao.He is a student.His family has _ people .They are his parents and him.He likes blue very much.All his things are _ ,including his schoolbag.He goes to school from Monday to Friday.He has seven subjects this term.His favorite _ is Science.Mr. Wang is his favorite teacher _ he is fun.He has lunch at school.For lunch,he has some vegetables,rice and _ egg.He doesn't like hamburgers.He thinks it _ healthy.His classes _ at 5:00 p.m.After school,he likes to play basketball with his classmates.
At the weekend ,he is always very _ .His mother has a clothes store.He often helps his mother sell clothes.The clothes look cool and they are _ very good prices.You can come to the store and have a _ at the clothes.
